answers.answer: OMG!  I'm 14w3d and I'm experiencing the same!  It was so bad yesterday, I was puking:/  I have my check up today in a couple hours and I plan on asking.  I will let you know what she says.

I had the same issue with blinding killer headaches and talked to my Dr and she said Tylenol and lots of water but after going to my routine ob Dr approved trip to the chiropractic appointment my headaches disappeared. I have to go back weekly but I was told it is because when pregnant your joints and ligaments loosen and come out of alignment quicker and my neck gets really messed up... could be worth looking into for you :-)
Thank you and please do keep me posted
OK, so my Dr said it is probably hormones, but BC of my history of gestational diabetes,  she is sending me on Tuesday to do my blood glucose test just incase.

Same issues here I hate these darn headaches ruins my day my doc said she would prescribe me vicodn if I wanted I just dont feel comfortable taking that but then again im sure all this Tylenol isnt good ether . I do suffer from weird neck issues wich could easily be the cause cus my boobs are getting huge

question: I am 14 weeks and last week I've started getting these awful headaches anyone else ?
title: headaches
